Options handler

Clones a set of options, returning a new options object

public hasOpt(opts : Dynamic, field : String) : Bool

public optFloat(opts : Dynamic, field : String, defaultValue : Float) : Float

public optInt(opts : Dynamic, field : String, defaultValue : Int) : Int

public optString(opts : Dynamic, field : String, defaultValue : String) : String

public removeFields(opts : Dynamic, fields : Array<String>) : Void

parameters
opts Input opts to be modified
fields list of field names to remove
Takes the input opts and removes all the fields specified.
